question: What will the following command display: `docker logs -n 50 <container-id>`?
options: The most recent 50 log lines from the container.
The logs of the last 50 seconds of container activity.
The top 50 processes running in the container.
The logs from the first 50 seconds of container creation.
explanation: `docker logs -n 50 <container-id>` displays the last 50 lines of the container's logs.
